pages.text: When you tame a pet, you can use shift-left-click to allow it to wander. Just be careful to keep an eye on it so it doesn't wander off too far!
Pets that can sport collars, such as Dogs, Cats, Wolves, Ocelots and Foxes can have a Gender Indicator on the back  of their collar if turned on in the client config.
When you tame a collar-able pet, you can use any dye to put a collar on it. Use Shears to remove it again if desired.
